name: Berrything_HD
description:
Merged between Berry_HD with Anything3.0, this model hopes to produce much more accurate image results. Anything3.0 was a good one because they made it so accurate, however one thing that I kinda dislike is how the resulted images were often washed out so I had to mix it with Berry_HD with weighted sum of 0.5. Focusing towards creating accurate 2D anime and 2D realistic art. Can be used with VAE models (Recommended: Anything-V.3.0.vae.pt)

Warning: This model is focused solely on NSFW image generation. You must be at least 18 years old or above before using this model. I an not responsible if anything happens during the usage of this model below the legal age.
